Articles.Content:
In my quest to design and build the perfect flying machine i have taken the design of "The beast" to the next level.

Introducing the future of Kerbin air travel, sporting a revolutionary design, The H.A Super Beast (mk 3)

This sub orbital super glider is more than just that, Do not let its fancy design fool you, Nothing on this plane is for cosmetics,

it will put most small planes to shame through tight bends while being completely unstallable, then after teaching them who is boss in the turns leave them in the dust as it shoots off around the planet at speeds up to mach 6.

H.A Super Beast (mk3)

Front view

Rear view

Description:

After finishing my super glider pack i started to wonder if it would actually be possible to do better on "The beast (mk6)" and started a completely new yet somewhat similar design.

Capable of flying as high and faster than the HA Mongrel (mk2) with more maneuverability than The beast (mk6)

Capable of 30m/s take off at 5% thrust.

Capable of 15+g turns.

Capable of 200+m/s at low atmoshpere.

Capable of mach 6+ (2100+ m/s)

This plane is completely unstallable unlike the beast mk6 which you can actually stall if you want to (this things not quite as good at acrobatics because it simply will not stall no matter how hard you try lol)

Weight: 266184

522 parts.

Made in v.24

Flight instructions:

Have fun and enjoy, nothing else needs to be said.

Download link:

http://www./download/dnv2qabkam3wao1/H_A+Super+Beast+%28mk3%29.craft

A few pictures of this thing in the air.

Cornering.

Breaking 2000m/s

Cruising altitude/speed.

Sub orbit.

If you missed my super glider pack here is a link to it, 4 planes included, each about as fun as this bad boy to fly.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/90964-Roflcopterkklol-Industries-Super-glider-pack

Feel free to leave a comment telling me what you think of my work.

Engineers note: I have not tested this plane on FAR or deadly re entry, feel free to let me know how it goes.

Oh and yes, you can put landing gear on the top of it and it will land upside down no worries, i left it off because looks.

(If you are a bit of a purist feel free to remove the internal control surfaces, it still flies fine.)

Now that this exists, if people want it to a "Super Mongrel" can be my next project, otherwise i am going to start work on an SSTO using this wing design.

Edited August 21, 2014 by Roflcopterkklol
It certainly looks...unique But how is it a glider? I see engines - at least ten of them.

It certainly looks...unique But how is it a glider? I see engines - at least ten of them.

Not a glider, a super glider, way better than a glider haha,

Turn the engines off and it will glide pretty much forever, should be able to take off without the engines if you tap w and s fast enough too.

Edit:

I just tested it, on take off hold w and s down about a second each time and it will lift at 30m/s, once in the air tap them a bit faster and it will fly at 150m/s in horizontal flight with no engines, still unstallable also.

That's how it's a super glider

Edited August 20, 2014 by Roflcopterkklol

Anyone had a fly of this thing yet?

Keen to hear what people think of it
